items.title: AnimateScroll
items.description: A Simple jQuery Plugin for Animating Scroll with more than 30 unique easing effects.

items.title: FailSafe
items.description: A jQuery Plugin to make your App Robust. Protects your App from Lost Internet Connectivity & Low Battery Level.

items.title: ContentShare
items.description: A Simple jQuery plugin which lets you share the exact content on a page which you actually want to share. It enables you to share selected text on your social network.
